Package ohos.storageinfomgr

Class StorageInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.storageinfomgr.StorageInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable

    public final class StorageInfo
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    Provides the storage information of an application.

    The storage information includes the application size, application data size, and application cached data size. The information is usually returned at the request of StorageInfoManager#queryInfoByPackageName(UUID, String, int) and StorageInfoManager#queryInfoByUid(UUID, int). This class also provides the Sequenceable interface, with which you can marshal data into or unmarshal data from a parcel. Specifically, if storage information is transmitted across processes, the sender can marshal data to the Parcel and transmit the data, and the receiver can unmarshal the data from the Parcel to obtain the storage information.

    Since:
    3
    See Also:
    StorageInfoManager, Parcel, Sequenceable
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.ResourceSchedule#STORAGE_INFO

    • Field Detail

      • PRODUCER

        public static final Sequenceable.Producer<StorageInfo> PRODUCER
        Default constructor used to create a StorageInfo object.

        When you use this constructor to create a StorageInfo object, also call its member method Sequenceable.Producer.createFromParcel(Parcel). If the input parameter is empty, the operation will fail and null will be returned.

        If application storage status information has been stored in the parcel object in Parcel but you want to use the StorageInfo object instead, run the following statement: StorageInfo info = StorageInfo.PRODUCER.createFromParcel(parcel).

        Since:
        3

        The application data actually consists of two parts, the application data and the cached data.

      • marshalling

        public boolean marshalling​(Parcel out)
        Marshals the application storage status information.

        Use this method to marshal the storage status information into Parcel. This method overrides Sequenceable.marshalling(Parcel).

        Specified by:
        marshalling in interface Sequenceable
        Parameters:
        out - Indicates the parameter into which the storage status information is marshalled.
        Returns:
        true: Returns true if marshalling is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • unmarshalling

        public boolean unmarshalling​(Parcel in)
        Unmarshals the application storage status information.

        Use this method to unmarshal the storage status information from the input Parcel and save the information. This method overrides Sequenceable.unmarshalling(Parcel).

        Specified by:
        unmarshalling in interface Sequenceable
        Parameters:
        in - Indicates the parameter from which the storage status information is unmarshalled.
        Returns:
        true: Returns true if unmarshalling is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3
